Restarting explorer.exe will close all open explorer windows.

6:
Disables wallpaper JPEG compression
If 'I'm running Windows 11' is checked, this will enable compact mode in Explorer, and the legacy context menu.

20: Checks if winget is installed, and if not, this opens a window, which lets you install it.
